bibl.title: Remarks on a Delphic Ptolemaic Dynastic Group Monument.
bibl.note: Proposes a restoration of the dedicatory inscription F.D. III, 4, 2, 233 (= I.G. IX, I2, 1, 202) that differs to some degree from Flacelière's and more significantly from: Chris BENNETT, The Children of Ptolemy III and the Date of the Exedra of Thermos, ZPE 138 (2002) pp. 144-145.
bibl.seg: KOSMETATOU Elizabeth, Remarks on a Delphic Ptolemaic Dynastic Group Monument.

Proposes a restoration of the dedicatory inscription F.D. III, 4, 2, 233 (= I.G. IX, I2, 1, 202) that differs to some degree from Flacelière's and more significantly from: Chris BENNETT, The Children of Ptolemy III and the Date of the Exedra of Thermos, ZPE 138 (2002) pp. 144-145.
